questions.question: They held a press conference last week to ……………………….. support for their proposal.
questions.description: To drum up support is to gain support.

questions.question: The deal ………………………. at the last minute for reasons that were not clear.
questions.description: If a deal falls through, it fails and it is abandoned.

questions.question: He .............................. the channels hoping to find something interesting.
questions.description: To flip through is to change from one channel to another. Flick through has the same meaning.

questions.question: It is not uncommon for people to ………………………… alternative medicine when modern drugs don’t work.
questions.description: When you fall back on something/somebody you turn to it/them when you are in difficulty.

questions.question: The word .......................... that she was having an affair with her boss.
questions.description: When news gets around, it spreads.

questions.question: He is not a bright student and he doesn’t do well in his tests. He just manages to ........................
questions.description: To get by is to live on very little money, or to manage to do something with difficulty.

questions.question: The meat smells awful. It must have .............................
questions.description: If meat goes off, it is not good anymore.

questions.question: Legal battles are slow and expensive. In many cases, the appeals process ………………………….. for years.
questions.description: If something drags on, it lasts longer than necessary.

questions.question: She was tired and ....................... while watching TV
questions.description: To drop off is to fall asleep. Doze off has the same meaning.

questions.question: Human rights activists have been asking the government to ............................. the death penalty.
questions.description: To do away with something is to abolish it.

questions.question: I think it was the lack of sleep more than the drinks that really …………………………..
questions.description: When something does you in, it makes you tired.

questions.question: His marriage ………………………….. when his wife discovered that he had been cheating on her.
questions.description: When things fall apart, they disintegrate or break into pieces. When relationships fall apart, they fail to work.
